pages.text: The first mob added to the mod, the Hovering Inferno is a dangerous Nether mob

The Hovering Inferno (or just Inferno) is a blaze-like mob that patrols the Nether. It is an uncommon "random encounter" spawn, and when it shows up it spawns several Blazes along with it. It is capable of shooting a line of fireballs at its enemies, and can put up its shields to block damage which can be disabled like a normal shield.$(br2)Drops: Blaze Rod, $(l:items/inferno_piece)Shattered Blaze Piece$(/l), $(l:items/inferno_helmet)Inferno Helmet$(/l)
